subject: Turn holiday shoppers into customers today
description_text:
Make it This Holiday Season on TikTok ❄️ 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 December is one of the 
most active moments
 of the year on TikTok. Shoppers are searching for gifts, inspiration and 
ideas,
 and businesses who show up now are the ones people remember in January.
 
 
This is the perfect time to launch your first 
TikTok Ads
 campaign and set yourself up for a strong start to 2026. Whether you want more 
product sales
 or high quality leads, TikTok gives you everything you need to grow. 
 
 

 
 
 
 
Start advertising today 
 

 
 
 
 
 
Why now works so well 
Massive 
seasonal discovery and engagement Shoppers ready to buy, browse and convert
 A fresh pipeline for Q1 2026
 Simple tools for ecommerce and lead generation
 Up to £4,400 in ad credits for new advertisers (T&C apply)
 
 
Your next step: Create your TikTok Ads Manager account 
, start your first campaign, and claim ad credits if you're eligible.
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
   
 

 
 
 
 
   
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
TikTok Shop 
6th Floor One London Wall 

London, EC2Y 5EB
